answers.answer: Have you been checked for vertigo?

this sounds like anxiety to me these are all the symptoms and more i have been living with for the past yearor so! if your worried speak to your doctor about possible anxiety! it sound like it to me dont worry! :)

Yes it does sound like anxiety/depression.  These are very common symptoms of these disorders.   Many of us have gone thru these very same things.Speak to your doc about it..there are many treatment options available.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!First of all treat yourself for heartburn by taking say Omeprazole 20 mg empty stomach in morning and an antacid gel after meals. Get yourself investigated for anemia, hypothyroidism and diabetes and if you are overweight, start an exercise regimen you can stick to. PCOS is another condition which can cause similar symptoms. If all these are normal, then possibility of anxiety and depression will need to be looked at.Hope this helps. I think you should discuss these possibilities with your doctor. It is difficult to comment beyond this without examining. A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: i am 24 and female, i have been going to the doctors for nearly 3 year with thses symptoms and got worse and worse for about the last year, feeling sick constant, feeling dizzy and drunk, of balance,spaced out feeling as if am not realy hear, shakey,faint and constantly tired to the point i have to have naps in the day, i cant be bothered to do anything and have very little energy and have constant headaches. i have alsohad stitch and alot of heartburn lately.can any body help please .
